post_title: LTB beaters: gandil, cobbs, shag, etc
post_content:
can be graded (1.5-1)....or raw....common backs.

need these:

chick gandil
cobb green
cobb red
shag shaunessy
wajo pitching hands at chest
crawford bat
marquard follow thru
matty white cap
matty dark cap
waddell throwing


thanks!
jim
